original_text:
Listen to my cry,
    for I am in desperate need;
rescue me from those who pursue me,
    for they are too strong for me.
korean_text: 나의 부르짖음을 들으소서 나는 심히 비천하니이다 나를 핍박하는 자들에게서 나를 건지소서 그들은 나보다 강하니이다

sentences.original_text: for I am in desperate need
rescue me from those who pursue me
for they are too strong for me
